title: How Much Will Ghost of Tsushima Sell? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.17.20
description:
Blessing and Greg round out the week by talking about NPD and predicting where Ghost of Tsushima will end up in sales.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:11:00 - Housekeeping
The Kinda Funny Xcast kicks off Saturday at 6 am PT on youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast services. Get your questions in now on kindafunny.com/patreon!
Remember: kindafunny.com/store has a bunch of great shit
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:12:55 - The Last of Us Part 2 continues to kill it in sales - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:23:50 - Microsoft discontinues Xbox One X and Xbox One S digital edition - Tom Warren @ The Verge
00:26:50 - With the discontinuation of the Xbox One X now guaranteeing the existence of Lockhart, do you believe the rumors of what it supposedly will be? You know, the part where it is targeting 1080p to provide that budget price.  - Best Friends Q:MalcontentRonin
00:37:20 - What was up with that Geoff Keighley PS5 Dualsense hands on demo?
00:45:35 -  Was it just me or was Geoff's Hands On with the DS5 lame?  - Best Friends Q:DJBradChill
00:46:37 - Did Sony make a mistake wanting to do this or is this just something we had to get due to the COVID Times? - Best Friends Q:Borzen00
00:56:12 - Dreams wins Game of the Year at Games for Change Festival - Matthew Handrahan @ GiBiz
00:58:25 - Out today
01:00:10 -  KFG
 Reader mail   -
01:01:04 - Do you think that we could get PS5 and series X news during the Gamescom opening night? - James
01:04:50 - Squad Up: Blockfighter(Stadia) - blockfighter
01:05:02 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday: Blessing and Tim
Tuesday: Blessing and Imran
Wednesday: Greg and Gary
Thursday: Greg, Tim, Blessing, Andy, and Snowbike Mike (Post show for the Xbox Games Showcase)
Friday: Blessing and Greg
